data.title: Scott Glenn: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Scott Glenn: Check out the list of all Scott Glenn movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Scott Glenn news on Times of India.
data.text:
BLACKPINK's Lisa lights up Incheon airport as she heads to Thailand for ‘The White Lotus’ season 3 shoot!

etimes.in / Mar 19, 2024, 14:14 (IST)

Lisa departs YG Entertainment, launching LLOUD label for music and acting. She now gears up for 'The White Lotus' in Thailand, showcasing independence and creative autonomy, exciting fans worldwide.

Leo Woodall says 'The White Lotus' season 2 was like "one big holiday" for him

ANI / Feb 12, 2024, 17:02 (IST)

Woodall shared insights into the filming experience of "The White Lotus" Season 2. This abundance of free time led to the cast spending a significant amount of time vacationing together. In the second season, Woodall portrayed Jack, a British character involved in various plotlines, including flirting with Haley Lu Richardson's Portia and assisting in planning a murder.

BLACKPINK's Lisa to make acting debut in 'The White Lotus' Season 3; BLINKS react

etimes.in / Feb 13, 2024, 09:47 (IST)

BLACKPINK's Lisa is all set to make her acting debut in 'The White Lotus' season 3. Excited BLINKs expressed their shock and anticipation for her big acting debut. Lisa's role in the show is yet to be revealed, but her superstar status and Tahi origin, hints at a prominent presence.
